properties.displayName: Configure periodic checking for missing system updates on azure virtual machines
properties.description: Configure auto-assessment (every 24 hours) for OS updates on native Azure virtual machines. You can control the scope of assignment according to machine subscription, resource group, location or tag. Learn more about this for Windows: https://aka.ms/computevm-windowspatchassessmentmode, for Linux: https://aka.ms/computevm-linuxpatchassessmentmode.

metadata.description: The list of locations from which machines need to be targeted.
The list of tags that need to matched for getting target machines.
